tag_list: selvino, social-media, tematic-social-network, portals, knowledge-management, cms
overview:
Selvino de Souza is a leader who knows how to run a highly professional technology and marketing operation. He brings over 16 years of experience in software solutions at some of the most innovative companies in the world.

Today Selvino works with cutting-edge social media solutions and also hold senior management position at QUAY Technologies in Brazil.
